numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I found it interesting that a majority of young people do not visit their parents in person.
2. Around 25 percent of young people meet their parents in person.
3. I found it interesting that less than 50 percent of young people talk to their parents through video calls.
4. The graph shows that women talk to their parents more than men.
5. I wonder why young men talk to their parents less than young women.
6. I am curious whether this difference relates to societal gender norms about masculinity.
7. This information relates to me and my community.
8. This information shows that young people take less time and effort to contact their parents.
9. If this trend continues, then the number of young people who speak to their parents will decrease in future generations.
10. The headline is: Newer generations barely interact with their parents.
